sentences.sentence: One of the attractions of this hypothesis is its broad applicability.
sentences.translation: 这一假设的吸引力之一是其广泛的适用性。

sentences.sentence: Applicability of this machine can be widely used in the swimming pool, paddling pool, landscape pool, hot spring bathing pool, fishpond, and so on.
sentences.translation: 本机适用性可广泛应用于游泳池、戏水池、景观池、温泉洗浴池、养鱼池等。

sentences.sentence: The new approach had wide applicability to all sorts of different problems.
sentences.translation: 新方法广泛适用于解决各种各样的问题。
